org.safs.image

Class SharedLock

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.safs.image.SharedLock

  • public class SharedLock
extends java.lang.Object
    SharedLock is used to synchronized the main thread and search thread. And it contains some shared data between main thread and search thread. For main thread, please see method findImageWithXYBTThread() in ImageUtils For search thread, please see SmallPieceComparator
    Author:
    LeiWang
    See Also:
    ImageUtils, SmallPieceComparator
